name: dedtOLD
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4
body: -| wi(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w4))

stmt.origin: syl(w0, w1, wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2))
-| wi(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), w1)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(w0, wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2))
-| wi(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), w1)

|- wi(w0, w1)
-| wi(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), w1)

stmt.origin: mpbiri(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), w1, w4)
stmt.pretty: mpbiri((if(w0, w2, w3)↔ w2), w1, w4)

body.origin:
|- wi(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), w1)
-| w4
-| wi(wb(wif(w0, w2, w3), w2), wb(w1, w4))

comment: Obsolete version of ~ dedt as of 27-Apr-2023. The weak deduction theorem. For more information, see the Weak Deduction Theorem page ~ mmdeduction.html . (Contributed by NM, 26-Jun-2002.) Revised to use the conditional operator. (Revised by BJ, 30-Sep-2019.) (New usage is discouraged.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
